Html:
Hi guys,

I wanted to have a look at your Graph# component, but when I try to compile I see there's a dependency on Microsoft Code Contracts. As it is not included in the source code, I had a look at the official microsoft web site, but it appears there is only an educational and a commercial license. And the commercial license applies to use in VS team system, which I don't have, I'm using the pro version.

Is it possible to get rid of the Code Contracts dependency? Doesn't look like it's really crucial to the component.

Thanks!

Wout

I made a release today, and I separated the contracts from the Graph# dlls, so you can use the Graph# without using Microsoft.Contracts.

palesz
